headline: Jensen Huang Once Said He Would Have Followed Mark Zuckerberg's Playbook For A 'Head Start' In Life If He'd Known Success Would Take So Long
summary: At SIGGRAPH 2024, Nvidia Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang shared a humorous insight into the long road to success, joking that he might have followed Meta Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ:META) CEO Mark Zuckerberg's early college-dropout approach if he had known how long building a tech empire would take. CEOs Reflect On Decades Of Innovation During a wide-ranging discussion on the future of generative AI, Zuckerberg praised Huang for his role in powering the AI revolution. "There is a lot of n
